ygData.subject: Lambent Components
ygData.msgSnippet: This will make me seem lazy as hell, but I know someone out there has the exact requirements for all the lambent armor pieces and the exact requirements for
ygData.messageBody:
This will make me seem lazy as hell, but I know someone out there has the
exact requirements for all the lambent armor pieces and the exact
requirements for all the lambent gemstones and I am hoping that you will
post this one more time for me as I seem to not be able to find this
info...especially for the gemstones. I just don't want to run all the way
to the temple just to find out how many gold pieces I need to buy the gem
components and all that.

-Faras
